descriptionHtml:
Installation

1. Unpack file
2. Put in Skyrim Data Folder
3. Path should look like this \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data \\textures\\dlc02\\armor\\stahlrimheavy/stahlrimlight

Uninstallation

1. Delete the files that are shown in the above directory. 

Creating New Texture

1. Get permission from Kronica on forums.nexusmods.com 
2. Overwrite the textures in the directory shown above

Profile: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/6167080-kronica/

Other Notes

Please congratulate TheCyberSaints due to this being their first skyrim re-texture.
author: Kronica
